page.title: 08Shops/Facilities/Gt.Wal./Ac.
page.content: In Acton there are 4 shops:-a post office,grocers,general store and a newsagent.In Gt.Waldingfield there is a general store,post office and grocers. Also in Waldingfield there is a place to buy local produce.There is a garage and a car sales shop.The public house in Waldingfield is called The White Horse and the one in Acton is called The Crown. We carried out a shopping survey involving the people to find their weekly shopping habits.25 out of 34 use the village shops at least three times a week,and 8 people use the shops less than 8 times a week. Most people use Sudbury to do their weekly shopping.One person uses Waldingfield and another Colchester for their weekly shopping.
